evidence.source_document: Plaintiffs' Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs respectfully request that the Court enter a preliminary injunction in the form set forth in the proposed order attached to this motion as Exhibit A.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek to declare unlawful Defendants’ Directives; declare Defendants’ termination of grants in this manner unlawful; order Defendants to end their arbitrary and capricious, unconstitutional, and unlawful actions; and order Defendants to restore funding to the terminated NIH grants.
